version_description:
- Various UI improvements
- Subscription Model
- Swift Upgrade, the program is 2.4x faster

Some small fixes across the app to make the experience better!

1. Global Search Function on home screen fixed
2. Content Server download prompt on book detail screen
3. Meta-data showing on sorting books on home screen (ex: Date Added Calibre

1. New on-boarding flow for getting started
2. iPad grouping and sorting UI/UX spacing improved
3. Getting started guide in top right of app home page
4. Series tag shows on sorting
5. Bug fixes

1. Pushing quick fix in new version

Old release notes:

1. New on-boarding flow for getting started
2. iPad grouping and sorting UI/UX spacing improved
3. Getting started guide in top right of app home page
4. Series tag shows on sor

-Google Drive Cloud Connection available now
-Removed subscription screen showing every time

-Fixed custom port issue
